author: mirror.co.uk
title: 'It's horrible!' Holly Willoughby gets locked in camper van by Phillip Schofield LIVE on This Morning
text:
'It's horrible!' Holly Willoughby gets locked in camper van by Phillip Schofield LIVE on This Morning The ITV daytime host was NOT happy about having to watch Homes Under The Hammer Share Comments By Hayley Minn 15:23, 22 FEB 2017 TV Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next Kym Marsh jokes with Piers Morgan that she's play Watch this video again Watch Next Ferne McCann is accused of being a bunny boiler o 1:07 This Morning: Investigative journalist Mark Willi 1:01 This Morning: 'World's most followed baby' Harlen 0:24 Sonic Mania - Official Trailer 1:42 The Mpemba Effect and why hot water freezes faste Recreation of scenes from The Moorside emerges on 1:02 Former Eastenders star Ben Hardy to make televisi 0:20 Shaun Williamson says Danny Dyer is under pressur 0:33 Video will play in Holly Willoughby gets STUCK in campervan on This Morning Share this video Watch Next celebs Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield had This Morning viewers in hysterics today, when he locked her in a camper van live on the show.
The ITV daytime show presenters were looking at caravans when Holly decided to get into a tiny one.
While Phil was round the back looking in the boot, Holly realised she’d been locked in.
She was knocking frantically on the window, leaving him in hysterics.
Read More Trinny Woodall in awkward wardrobe malfunction as she unwittingly flashes a boob filming video blog Holly was presenting in the teeny camper van But Phil locked her in! And she was forced to watch Homes Under the Hammer But a cruel Phillip said: “I have no intention of getting her out.”
Meanwhile, as she was panicking about never getting out, Holly joked the TV was not to her taste.
She shouted out the tiny window: “We’re not even watching This Morning on the telly in here.
“We’re watching the BBC. It’s horrible!”
Read More Kate and Gerry McCann "baffled" after TV detective unveils "astonishing new theory" about Madeleine's disappearance on This Morning She was eventually let out The struggle is real Holly’s clearly not a fan of Homes Under The Hammer then!
Eventually, Phil let Holly out of the caravan, but viewers were in hysterics at the funny This Morning moment.
One said: “Holly through the window god I love her #ThisMorning.”
Another added: “Hahaha Holly is stuck in the little caravan and Phil won't let her out #ThisMorning.”
*This Morning continues on ITV1 weekdays at 10.30am
